title: Prime Day blowout: These M1 Macs are cheaper than they’ve ever been
content:
Deals on M1 Macs aren’t all that hard to come by, but Amazon’s Prime Day deals are way better than usual. We’re already seeing some colors and configurations sell out, so if you want one, we recommend grabbing it quickly. Just note, some prices aren’t reflected until you add them to the card and start the checkout process, as we’ve noted below.

Check out our full roundup up Amazon Prime Day Apple deals and be sure to check back often as more deals are added.

The M1 MacBook, MacBook Air, and Mac mini were Apple’s first Macs with homegrown silicon, and they all perform insanely well. If you have a keyboard, mouse, and monitor, the Mac mini offers the best price-to-performance value, but the MacBook Air at $100 off is a fantastic option as well. And if you like the Touch Bar and need a bit more performance, the 13-inch MacBook Pro at $200 off is a great option as well. Here are the best deals we’ve found so far:

Mac mini

Mac mini (M1, 256GB): $599 ($100 off with automatic discount at checkout)

Mac mini (M1, 512GB): $780 ($119 off with automatic discount at checkout)

MacBook Air

MacBook Air (M1, 7-core GPU, 256GB): $899 ($100 off with automatic discount at checkout)

MacBook Air (M1, 8-core GPU, 512GB): $1,100 ($149 off with automatic discount at checkout)

MacBook Pro

13-inch MacBook Pro (M1, 256GB): $1,100 ($199 off)

13-inch MacBook Pro (M1, 512GB): $1,299 ($200 off with automatic discount at checkout)

Amazon is also offering all-time-low deals on the 24-inch iMac, though they’re not nearly as impressive. You can save $50 on either the 7-core GPU base model in blue or silver, or knock $50 off the price of the silver 8-core GPU model, which is what we’d recommend buying.
author: Michael Simon
